context: Do you know when Despicable Me was released?
Yes, actually I remember it came out in 2010. Have you seen it?
Yes I took my little sister to go see it. Do you know who some of the actors are?
I sure do, I'm sure you know it has Steve Carell but it also stars Rob Huebel and Kristen Wiig. Oh and Julie Andrews!
Oh I love Steve Carell, he was also im Get smart. Have you seen that one?
I have, doesn't that also have Larry Miller and Anne Hathaway?
Yes it does! Larry Miller also stars in I Am Comic with Sarah Silverman.
I knew I recognized the name, can I interest you in any information about any of these comedians?
Yes, do you know any other movies with Sarah Silverman?
resp: She was in a classic called There's Something About Mary, and she also did voice work for Wreck-it Ralph.

context.content: "Jack Reacher" is a crime thriller film based on the book series by Lee Child. It follows the story of a former military police officer who becomes entangled in a complex and dangerous investigation. The movie features intense action sequences and a suspenseful plot, but it may not have the traditional adventurous elements you're seeking. If you're looking for more of an adventure, "The Maze Runner" might be a better fit for you.
Can you tell me more about "The Maze Runner"? I'd like to know if it has the thrilling adventure and suspenseful thriller elements I'm looking for.

context.content: "The Maze Runner" is a science fiction action thriller film based on the novel by James Dashner. It follows the story of a group of young boys who are trapped in a mysterious maze with no memory of their past. The movie features thrilling adventure as the characters navigate the dangerous maze and try to uncover its secrets. It also has suspenseful thriller elements as they face various challenges and threats. I think you'll enjoy the adrenaline-pumping action and suspenseful storyline in "The Maze Runner."
"The Maze Runner" sounds like it has everything I'm looking for - thrilling adventure and suspenseful thriller. I'll definitely give it a watch. Thanks for the recommendation! [END]

I think the recommender did a good job of understanding my preferences and providing relevant recommendations. I'm glad I asked for more details before making a decision.
